text:
Velocity - Movement of Matter in Space and Time
Matter and Vacuum - Refraction, max. phase velocity, max. group velocity:
Lightspeed, group velocity max.:
\[\begin{split} &
c =
\frac{1}{ { \sqrt{\epsilon_0 \mu_0} } } =
\frac{|\mathscr{E}|}{|\mathscr{B}|} =   
\sqrt{v_{phase} \cdot v_{matter}} =
\eta \sqrt{\varepsilon\mu} =
\eta \sqrt{\varepsilon_0\varepsilon_r\mu_0\mu_r} =   \\&
\eta \cdot c_{ph} =
\frac{\omega}{k} =\frac{\lambda}{\mathcal{T}} =
\nu \lambda =      \\&
- \frac{d\lambda}{d\nu} \nu^2 =
\lambda^2 \frac{\mathscr{J}_{\lambda}}{\mathscr{J}_{\nu}} =
\frac{\langle|\mathscr{S}|\rangle}{\langle \textnormal{w}_{EM}\rangle}  =
v_{gr}^{max}      \\&
\le v_{ph} - \lambda \frac{d}{d\lambda}v_{ph} =
\frac{d}{dk}\omega =
v_{gr}
\end{split} \tag{1}\]
where:
\(\mathscr{J} \equiv\) Flux Density flow 1
\(\mathscr{S} \equiv\) Poyinting-Vector intensity
\(\textnormal{w}_{EM} \equiv\) Energy Density electromagnetic
Refraction Index:
